noun.name: refrigerator
noun.discription: a large appliance used for preserving food at low temperatures

object1.name: oven
object1.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a kitchen appliance used for cooking and baking food

object2.name: microwave
object2.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a kitchen appliance used for heating food quickly using microwave radiation

object3.name: dishwasher
object3.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a kitchen appliance used for cleaning dishes and cookware automatically

object4.name: washing machine
object4.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a household appliance used for washing laundry

object5.name: dryer
object5.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a household appliance used for drying clothes after washing

object6.name: air conditioner
object6.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is an appliance used for cooling and dehumidifying indoor air

object7.name: vacuum cleaner
object7.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a household appliance used for cleaning floors and carpets by suction

object8.name: blender
object8.discription: in parallel with 'refrigerator', is a kitchen appliance used for mixing, pureeing, or emulsifying food and liquids
